name: # Type XII Siege Cannon
customPrimary:
A portion of the soft flux generated by each shot dissipates over the next %s seconds: %s for capital ships, %s for cruisers, and %s for smaller hulls.

Flux reduction modifiers reduce the excess flux dissipated %s the remaining flux cost of each shot. If flux reduction is less than the portion of additional flux normally dissipated, the resulting generated flux remains the same.

Dissipates %s/%s/%s/%s percent of the flux generated by each shot over the next %s seconds, depending on hull size.

Flux reduction effects lower the excess flux dissipated before the remaining flux cost of each shot. If flux reduction is less than the portion of additional flux normally dissipated, the final resulting flux remains the same.
